row.Name: Unregistered
row.Description: A User that has visited and posted, but has not registered on the site.

row.Name: Registered
row.Description: A User that has reserved his/her display name with a valid OpenID identifier.

row.Name: Moderator
row.Description: A User with all privileges on the glorious StackOverflow site.

row.Name: Administrator
row.Description: A User that runs a StackExchange site.
